The 75 Most Important Women of the Past 75 Years

By Glamour
February 7, 2014

      American women have done amazing things since Glamour began in 1939. (You know: run for president, set world records, go into space—stuff like that). In tribute we, and a few notable friends, have put together this highly subjective timeline of badass U.S. barrier-breakers who changed the world for all of us, starting back then and going all the way up to now. Add your own by tweeting us @glamourmag with #glam75.
